Reviews.Title: “good feeling living in comfortable apartments”
Reviews.Author: Naoko D
Reviews.Content: Good feeling and comfortable apartments. I planed to choose a single apartment with a small kitchen but the staff showed me other bigger apartments with full kitchen rooms. Definitely better than an hotel for long stayings...

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, spacious, very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: GobnaitOh
Reviews.Content: For me, the few kilometers from the bustle of the city was part of the attraction. The no. 32 bus brought me to the edge of the Vatican city and from there I toured at leisure. (Buy your ticket in advance from a tobacconists or booth). The property was nicer than the images I had seen, the room was cool and spacious with everything you could need. Some lovely cafes and restaurants nearby though mostly I bought from the nearby deli and fruit shop and ate on the balcony. I've tossed my coin in the Trevi Fountain so I will surely be back, and will once again choose Residence Fleming.

Reviews.Title: “Too Far from Rome!”
Reviews.Author: CathyOne
Reviews.Content: My husband & I stayed here for 6 nights in June 2009. The apartment was spacious & clean, with a maid service every day. But it is just too far from the centre of Rome. There is a bus that goes to the Vatican, but it is a 10 minute walk to the bus stop. This place is out of the central metro bus & train area. So we ended up spending a fortune on taxis. The Internet access is free & quite fast, but not on the 2nd floor! We had to change our room to the 3rd floor to get good access, my husband needed it for business. The kitchen is small, but adequate - no oven or microwave though. The hot water in the bathroom runs out after one shower & takes an hour or more to heat up again. There is a balcony & they don't mind smoking in the rooms. Be aware that if you stay here, you are out of Rome central & will spend a lot on taxis (not cheap in Rome), I would not stay here again just for that reason.

HotelInfo.Name: Residence Fleming
HotelInfo.Address: Via Guido Banti, 33, 00191 Rome, Italy
